title: Hardena Waroeng Surabaya
typeOfFood: Ovo, Buffet, Take-out, Asian, Indonesian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small and quaint family owned and operated Indonesian restaurant hidden away on the corner of a residential block. Best known for its buffet, featuring a rotation of ten different items, usually a third of which are vegan or vegetarian. Vegan items are not listed but staff is knowledgeable on what is and isn't vegan, so please just ask. Some of the vegan items include tempeh and tofu kecap, tempeh stew, kering kentang, collard greens and jackfruit.
